name: Cheesy Potato-Cauliflower Soup
author: Sass
summary: This cheesy potato-cauliflower soup is a brightened take on traditional cheese soups. The vinegar, lemon, and cayenne give it a wonderful kick!
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Combine cauliflower, potatoes, broth, celery, carrots, and onions in a large saucepan; bring to a boil
Cover and cook until vegetables have softened, about 10 minutes
Remove from the heat but keep the lid on
Melt butter in another large saucepan over medium heat
Whisk in flour; cook and whisk until bubbly and brown, about 3 minutes
Remove from heat and gradually whisk in milk
Return to medium heat and cook until thickened, 5 to 10 minutes
Add veggies and broth to the milk mixture
Add vinegar, garlic powder, lemon juice, cayenne, salt, and pepper
Remove from the heat and slowly add Cheddar, Swiss, and American cheeses, stirring well until melted
Ladle into bowls and garnish with scallions
